document_data.name: Calabrista
document_data.mainbody: '''Calabrista''', or '''Great Lady Calabrista''', was the director of a finishing school in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: In some occassions she could appear to be triple-bosomed. During her meeting with Elminster, she wore many petticoats with gauze and gems, and many of her clothes had lace.
document_data.Personality: She liked to talk up her students, but some people she talked to got the impression that she was talking them up as though they were wares.
document_data.Activities: She ran a finishing school for wealthy dames, the lessons of which included magic. She prided on her ability to draw out their talent for magic.
document_data.Relationships: As of {{yearlink|1364}}, she had at least four students she considered the cream of her crop, which included [[Noum√©a Fairbright]].
document_data.History: She was hosted for tea by [[Elminster]] on [[Eleasis 4]], {{yearlink|1364}}, alongside several of her students she meant for him to test at their aptitude for [[the Art]]. He pranked her by pretending to be eating sandwiches made of [[snail]]s and [[tree slug]]s; she was disconcerted, furthermore, by the persistent attacks of a [[Red Wizard]]ess on Elminster.
